Name: St Hilda's Anglican School for Girls

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8am-5pm. General reference assistance available and copying services for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans.

About.Access: Application for access required to be approved by Principal. Advance notice of visit required where possible.

About.Major holdings: St Hilda's Anglican School: Annual Reports 1931- (1m); Chronicles 1904- (2m); School History 1896- (1m); Photograph Collection 1896- (5m).
